QuestData.Title: The False Talon King
QuestData.Description: Ikiss was once a respected sage among the Adherents, but his search for the truth of Terokk's fall led to his own banishment.$B$BIkiss became obsessed with Terokk, even claiming to be the old hero reborn. He commands the Sethekk, promising untold power in a new age of darkness.$B$BKnow this: Ikiss is no Talon King. Slay the delusional fool, and search him for anything useful. He is known to collect powerful trinkets.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A crazed arcanist who believes himself to be Terokk reborn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Scuffed Bangle from Talon King Ikiss.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you silenced the false king?
QuestData.RewardText: A bracelet? Interesting... rather plain looking...
